content:
ACL Requirements

  • Describes requirements for access control for web authoring environments

    • Author: Howard Palmer
    • Latest revision: draft-ietf-webdav-acreq-00 (11/97)

  • Continues earlier work by Jon Radoff on access control

  • Discussion is still preliminary

    • Needs further discussion to reach convergence of viewpoint

  • Will be discussed in Tuesday session
